name: Illuminator (btthl)
description:
Illuminator is a 2D top-down shooter, where the goal is to fuse progressively stronger demons together and defeat them to gain their upgrades until you can defeat the strongest demon.

Premade Assets

  • Snake's Authentic Gun Sounds - https://f8studios.itch.io/snakes-authentic-gun-sounds
  • Music by DavidKBD - https://davidkbd.itch.io/eternity-metal-scfi-music-pack
  • Free Deadly Kombat Sound Effects - https://danielsoundsgood.itch.io/free-deadly-kombat-sound-effects
  • Blazma Font - https://ggbot.itch.io/blazma-font
  • Compendium of Dragons SFX - https://ateliermagicae.itch.io/compendium-of-dragons-sfx-free-demo

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Left Click - Shoot/Slide
  • Right Click - Grab/Throw
  • P/Escape - Pause
